PSCT.Base: Gain 500 LP for each "Abyss Actor" monster you control. If this Set card in its owner's control is destroyed by an opponent's card effect, and you have a face-up "Abyss Actor" Pendulum Monster in your Extra Deck: You can draw until you have 5 cards in your hand. You can only use each effect of "Abyss Script - Opening Ceremony" once per turn.
